name: We're Going Nuclear!
description:
Congratulations on your new job as nuclear controls engineer! You start tonight on the skeleton crew.

It's your job to keep the nuclear power plant up and running. Unfortunately, this plant has a .... reputation for being unstable. Critical systems break, hackers takeover the mainframe, temperature spikes. The works.

Can you keep the electricity flowing while avoiding a nuclear meltdown? Can you even manage to survive the night? Find out in We're Going Nuclear!

Developer Notes:

  • Fullscreen is recommended since terminal text can appear small on some screens.
  • This game dramatizes the instability of nuclear power plants for gameplay purposes. However, we believe that nuclear energy is safe and effective and is an important part of a diverse energy system!

Built in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 49 by Ryan Winstead and Josh Todd.
